title: Bitcoin Hits Record High Ahead Of ‘Crypto Week’
description: House Republicans called the upcoming “Crypto Week” a step to make the U.S. the “crypto capital of the world.”

title: Bitcoin reaches fresh all-time high in market-wide breakout — what’s next?
description: Crypto markets surge to new all-time highs after months of range-bound trading. Institutional inflows, ETF expansion, and dollar diversification fuel momentum. Check out potential levels of interest through Daily and intra-day chart analysis and how the Market Cap is looking.

title: Bitcoin price all-time high: What’s behind crypto’s record-breaking rally – and how high could it go?
description: The cryptocurrency’s latest price surge has revived ‘digital gold’ comparisons

title: Best Cryptos to buy as Metaplanet acquires 2,205 more Bitcoins
description: Japanese investment firm Metaplanet is bolstering its Bitcoin holdings, recently snapping up 2,205 additional BTC, valued at roughly $238.7 million. This brings their total to 15,555 BTC, worth approximately $1.7 billion.  The move signals strong corporate confidence in Bitcoin as a treasury asset, fueling optimism in the crypto market. As Bitcoin’s bullish momentum grows, investors […]
